text.div:
Zika Virus Disease (Tests for Zika virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    79190-5 Zika virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    80825-3 Zika virus envelope E gene [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    80826-1 Zika virus envelope E gene [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection

    81149-7 Zika virus envelope E gene [Presence] in Amniotic fluid by NAA with probe detection

    91078-6 Zika virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
